name: First Kiss at a Spooky Soiree
name_original: First Kiss at a Spooky Soiree
description:
FIRST KISS AT A SPOOKY SOIREE is a visual novel created for Yuri Jam 2016. you play as marzipan, a light witch who's gone her whole life without kissing anyone--UNTIL TONIGHT! there are 7 endings, with 5 characters to pursue.

content advisory: some strong language. occasional screen shakes. lethal cuteness.

lovely backgrounds done by DarkChibiShadow!

the soundtrack to this game is available on bandcamp!

you can find more of my work HERE and hey if you like my games maybe consider supporting me on patreon!


UPDATES:

  • 8/19/17 - i messed up putting in the german font, now the game is no longer missing characters lol
  • 8/16/17 - added german translation, and a button to change the font to make things easier for dyslexic readers! i updated the gui a bit too--now when you get one of the main endings, a little picture from it will show up on the main menu :D
  • 2/14/17 - valentine's day update! added 3 endings.
  • 10/31/16 - added korean download!
